Model

Class Comments

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Comments
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Comments
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Comments object contains the user id,master comments id,sub comments id, sub comments title and body,a picture if it has date,location of the comments posted, a userName which published this comment
    Author:
    zuo2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
